pages.title: Enchantment Infusion
pages.text: $(key)Enchantment Infusion$() performs $(bold)directed enchanting$() and $(bold)item crafting$().$(br2)Core blocks: $(key)Enchantment Infusion Table$() and $(key)Enchantment Infusion Pedestal$().$(br2)$(bold)Right-click$() with an item to place it, and $(bold)empty-hand right-click$() to remove it.

pages.title: Directed Enchanting
pages.text: $(br)$(welcome/emi#ru)Check uses$() on the $(key)Enchantment Infusion Table$() or $(key)Enchantment Infusion Pedestal$() for recipes.$(br2)Place ingredients on the $(key)Pedestals$() (order doesn't matter). Then place the item to enchant on the center $(key)Table$() (its enchantment level must meet the recipe). Wait a few seconds to finish.

pages.title: Crafting Items
pages.text: $(br)Besides $(bold)directed enchanting$(), $(key)Enchantment Infusion$() can also craft most $(mage/scroll)spell scrolls$() and some special items.$(br2)Crafting items via $(key)Enchantment Infusion$() works the same way as $(bold)directed enchanting$().
